title: Authors and Citation
text: Aragaki K (2024). ezmtt: Easy MTT Assay Tidying Plotting. R package version 0.1.0, https://kaiaragaki.github.io/ezmtt/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ezmtt: Easy MTT Assay Tidying and Plotting},   author = {Kai Aragaki},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://kaiaragaki.github.io/ezmtt/}, }

what: Easy MTT Assay Tidying and Plotting
title: Easy MTT Assay Tidying and Plotting
text: ezmtt package analyzing MTT assay data - namely, fitting plotting curves calculating IC%. mainly serves ‘companion package’ protocol , flexible enough support variety plate layouts.

title: Easy MTT Assay Tidying and Plotting
text: can install development version ezmtt GitHub :

title: Easy MTT Assay Tidying and Plotting
code: library(ezmtt)  mtt |>   mtt_fit(conditions = list(     drug_a = c(0, 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000),     drug_b = c(0, 1, 10, 100, 1000, 10000),     NA,     NA   )) |>   mtt_plot(ic_pct = 50) #> Lowest dose is 0, converting to 1e-04 #> Lowest dose is 0, converting to 1e-04 #> Warning in sqrt(dEDval %*% varCov %*% dEDval): NaNs produced #> Warning in sqrt(dEDval %*% varCov %*% dEDval): NaNs produced #> Warning in sqrt(dEDval %*% varCov %*% dEDval): NaNs produced #> Warning in sqrt(dEDval %*% varCov %*% dEDval): NaNs produced #> Warning in sqrt(diag(varMat)): NaNs produced #> Warning in sqrt(diag(varMat)): NaNs produced

what: Example data from an MTT — mtt
title: Example data from an MTT — mtt
Example data from an MTT — mtt
Example data from an MTT — mtt
text: spectramax object data gp object containing absorbance values

title: Example data from an MTT — mtt
text: four conditions plate. plate divided quadrants. Concentrations drug increase left right (0, 1nM, 10nM, 100nM, 1uM, 10uM).

what: Fit an curve through MTT data — mtt_fit
title: Fit an curve through MTT data — mtt_fit
Fit an curve through MTT data — mtt_fit
code: mtt_fit(x, ...)  # S3 method for default mtt_fit(x, ...)  # S3 method for gp mtt_fit(x, ...)  # S3 method for data.frame mtt_fit(x, ...)  # S3 method for spectramax mtt_fit(x, conditions, ...)

title: Fit an curve through MTT data — mtt_fit
text: x object class gplate::gp, data.frame, mop::spectramax. See details. ... Unused conditions named list numerics length 4. Contains doses per quadrant. Names drug. quadrant omitted, supply NA. Quadrants go left right, top bottom. Identical names allowed.

title: Fit an curve through MTT data — mtt_fit
text: data.frame gplate::gp supplied, columns condition, dose, nm562 nm660

title: Plot MTT fits — mtt_plot
text: fits list fits, usually output mtt_fit ic_pct Numeric. NULL, IC plotted. Otherwise, plot ic_pct% IC % IC supplied.
